entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
